programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Craig OConnell ja Andy Casagrande seilaavat Serenajokea ylavirtaan ja yrittavat selvittaa, miksi nuoret harkahait uivat joelle, ja miten ne valttavat siella elavat krokotiilit.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Kiipeajat jatkavat uuvuttavaa matkaansa kohti Everestin huippua. Tim jaa kuitenkin jalkeen, ja Russel uhkaa heittaa hanet ulos. David suorittaa ensimmaisen traversen.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Huonot paatokset vainoavat ykkosryhman jasenia heidan saavuttaessaan neljannen leirin kuolemanvyohykkeella. Hapenpuute saa aikaan fyysisia vaikeuksia.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Pennsylvanian elaintensuojeluyhdistys auttaa takkuturkkista kulkukoiraa. Kissa, jonka kaulassa on suuri reika, kiidatetaan hoitoon.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Riutunut koira, joka painaa vain kolmanneksen normaalista painostaan, tuodaan elainsuojaan, ja tiimi auttaa kissaa, jonka jalka on juuttunut kaulukseen jo useita kuukausia sitten.

programme.title: Great White Kill Zone: Guadalupe
programme.desc: Guadalupen isot valkohait valjastetaan kameroilla ennenkuulumattoman pitkaksi 18 tunnin ajaksi. Nain paastaan haiden metsastysmaille ja seuraamaan saalistusta lahelta.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy auttaa yhta Los Angelesin palomiesta, kun tama ei pysty kasittelemaan hullua kissaansa Cocoa. Foley kauhistuttaa teksasilaista pariskuntaa oisilla pelotteluilla.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Tapaturma aiheuttaa pahan pettymyksen yhdelle ykkosryhman jasenelle, kun ryhma lahtee kuolemanvyohykkeelta kohti huippua.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Kakkosryhma tekee vaivalloisen matkan Everestin huipulle, mutta loppujen lopuksi laskeutuminen aiheuttaa enemman vaaroja yhdelle ryhman jasenelle.

programme.title: Villi Costa Rica
programme.desc: Costa Rica kuuluu maailman ekologisesti monimuotoisimpiin alueisiin ja siella asustaa mita ihmeellisempia otuksia, kuten harvinainen ja salaperainen oselotti, puuma ja moni muu.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: UUSI SARJA! Kausi 1, osa 1. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet

programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Craig OConnell ja Andy Casagrande seilaavat Serenajokea ylavirtaan ja yrittavat selvittaa, miksi nuoret harkahait uivat joelle, ja miten ne valttavat siella elavat krokotiilit.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The guys head to the turquoise waters of The Bahamas and try to catch venomous Lionfish without being stung.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Sun With Dara Ó Briain
programme.desc: Dara explores the darker side of the Sun, from the dangers of skin cancer to solar flares and the Bermuda Triangle of Space. Plus, the worlds largest solar furnace.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As the Arctic summer turns to fall and temperatures begin their decline, Alaskan ingenuity assists in securing materials for the coming freeze. To prepare for the winter ahead, bush-dwellers brave dangerous encounters with hungry predators.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to Sweden to meet Annalisa, the Italian chose a life on the streets of Europe as a teenager, and now is developing a forest hideaway on the fringes of Swedish society for her and her toddler.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: At the edge of the Moroccan Sahara, an international team of palaeontologists lead by Dr Nizar Ibrahim has uncovered the bones of one of the largest predatory dinosaurs that ever walked the Earth: a Spinosaurus.

programme.title: Julius Caesar: The Making of a Dictator
programme.desc: Events beyond Caesars control threaten to unravel his plans and leave him isolated. Pushed into a corner, he makes a decision that will change the course of the republic forever.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The guys head to the turquoise waters of The Bahamas and try to catch venomous Lionfish without being stung.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve and the team head to Sani Lodge in the Amazon rainforest to find one of the most feared snakes on Earth - the fer de lance. However, finding one wont be easy in this dense jungle habitat.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: All Romesh knows about Colombia is cocaine barons and for most of his life, that was more than enough to stop him wanting to visit. But is Colombias reputation for drug wars justified? 4/5

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle meets people who have moved to inhospitable parts of the world after leaving the rat race behind. Here he travels to the Namibian desert to spend time with 50-year-old Gideon David, who quit his career in life insurance to live in the largest conservation area in Africa. Ben embraces the harsh and relentless work of farm life in temperatures pushing 40C, tending more than 150 animals, repairing baboon damage to water pipes and learning how to castrate sheep with his teeth.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue Aikens tracks the abundance of creatures roaming around her camp. Andy Bassich and Denise Becker hope to build a lasting legacy along the Yukon River.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is in West Yorkshire, visiting a huge factory that makes more than 5,000 sofas every year. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey learns about the science of light bulbs.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: This programme focuses on the predatory skills of some of the most charismatic hunters found on the planet: whales, dolphins, tuna, shark and rapier-nosed billfish. The open ocean is unimaginably immense - it covers more than 360 million square kilometres of the Earths surface. Much of this huge expanse of seawater is marine desert with virtually no sign of life. Yet the fastest and most powerful survive, playing a deadly game of hide-and-seek with their prey. This charts how they track down prey in the seemingly featureless seas, following the extraordinary life of yellowfin tuna from a minute egg to a 200 kilogram, voracious predatory giant.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Police officers form a human chain as they attempt the dramatic rescue of a family of four during Tropical Storm Imelda, which unleashed record-breaking floods on Texas. A hike goes horribly wrong in Hawaii, when a sightseer slips.

programme.title: The Future of Nature
programme.desc: Documentary about the oceans and how science is helping combat the impact of climate change.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: In a festive special, Rom visits the Sahara Desert. Guided by Bobo, a local of Berber descent, Rom discovers a place that is vast and inhospitable, and utterly beautiful. 5/5

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Hailstones work to repair a vital piece of equipment for their hunting grounds. Sue Aikens contends with the dangers of the tundra while hunting for small game.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: In Alaska, Ben Fogle meets Mike and Fran, who live in a self-built log cabin in a remote spot ten days walk from civilisation. The family have created a completely self-sufficient lifestyle, working the land and trapping animals.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: A look at the survival techniques of creatures that endure the harsh conditions of the Arctic and Antarctic. For animals at both poles, life is dominated by the annual retreat and advance of the freezing sea ice and the challenge of surviving winters when temperatures drop. In the Arctic the polar bear is the top predator, catching seals on the ice and forcing seabirds to nest high up on cliffs. In Antarctica the flightless penguins have no ground-based predators to deal with but lurking in the water is the constant threat from leopard seals. Narrated by David Attenborough.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a colourful factory that produces 200,000 litres of paint and 10,000 metres of wallpaper every week.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans break trail and hunt for their survival during the tail end of the brutal winter.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Native Glaswegian Susan rejected retirement for a remote region of Africa, where she has set up both a school and a mountain-top restaurant.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben revisits Alex, living in the mountains of central Portugal, discovering Alex has followed his dream of creating a retreat and made significant progress with the infrastructure on his land.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Looping around Andalucía, the luxury Al Andalus train takes in some of the most staggeringly beautiful cities in Spain.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The trio head to Thailand, where they join an ancient nomadic tribe called the Sea Gypsies who help them catch a dangerous giant moray eel - by freediving with just a spear.

programme.title: Super Surgeons: A Chance At Life
programme.desc: Peter has a fast-growing tumour and needs throat reconstruction to save his life. Janets pancreatic cancer is wrapped around a vital vein - can the growth be removed?

programme.desc: The trio head to Thailand, where they join an ancient nomadic tribe called the Sea Gypsies who help them catch a dangerous giant moray eel - by freediving with just a spear.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve finds out who is boss as he faces a real life King Kong. He gets up close to Africas largest snake and stakes out a crocodile nest to try and catch a sneaky thief red-handed.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: A special episode featuring some of the best moments from the series. Steve races a cheetah, rescues a king cobra and shares some of those rare times when things go wrong. 11/11

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle reunites with a former medical student living in the woodlands of Arkansas. Ben discovers the impact a series of injuries have had on his physically demanding wild lifestyle.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: An orphaned baby triceratops must outwit a deadly T-rex. Today, paleontologists are uncovering her remains, allowing us to bring her story to life with stunning VFX.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Ricko DeWilde heads out on a proxy moose hunt. Sue Aikens builds an arctic entryway. The Hailstones pass down family fishing techniques. Andy Bassich revives his land after his injury.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben ventures off the wild coast of Northern Ireland to the remote and rugged island of Rathlin. He stays with 41-year-old Rauri Morgan, a former HR executive who turned his back on corporate life.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the Dell Ugo factory in Hertfordshire to reveal how it makes 500 million stuffed pasta parcels annually. Hes following the production of crab and crayfish raviolo, one of their best sellers.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle That Fell to Earth
programme.desc: As Nasa prepares Space Shuttle Columbia for its 28th mission, excitement and trepidation build amongst the astronauts and their families as they count down to launch.

programme.title: Egyptian Tomb Hunting
programme.desc: Tony Robinson travels the length of the Nile, from Cairo to Aswan, to investigate tombs of all shapes and sizes, and meets the archaeologists, including John Ward, who are unearthing extraordinary wonders.

programme.title: Changing Planet
programme.desc: In the second year of a seven-year project, six presenters chart the fight to save the planets endangered ecosystems. In this episode, we visit the Maldives, USA and Greenland.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Ricko DeWilde heads out on a proxy moose hunt. Sue Aikens builds an arctic entryway. The Hailstones pass down family fishing techniques. Andy Bassich revives his land after his injury.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle reunites with a former medical student living in the woodlands of Arkansas. Ben discovers the impact a series of injuries have had on his physically demanding wild lifestyle.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: For most of Romeshs adult life, the only news coming out of Zimbabwe has been bad news. Robert Mugabe, the eviction of the white farmers and a general aura of danger have combined to make Zimbabwe a no-go zone in the eyes of the world. Now, with Mugabe finally gone, Rom is travelling around the country to find out if Brits should be holidaying here once more. Rom is met by Chipo, a teacher who was born and raised in Harare under Mugabes rule. She explains that although people have been coming to the country, few venture beyond Victoria Falls. She wants to show Rom what they are missing on a grand, epic road trip that takes in stunning National Parks and close-up encounters with rhinos, elephants and the cheetah ambassador. Along the way he gets caught in biblical lightning storms, re-enacts the film Titanic on a Lake Kariba houseboat and tries the home-brewed beer he made in a bathtub in Bulawayo. But safe as the country feels, Rom is visiting at a time of undeniable turmoil. Mile-long petrol queues form at every station - the fallout of the countrys latest economic crisis. Rom learns about the origins of the conflict - from the denial of black culture in the Rhodesian era to the legacy of Cecil Rhodes - and finds out why this generation of Zimbabweans are so desperate for people to visit.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the secrets of the Guinness brewery in Dublin to reveal how it makes two million litres of Irish stout every single day. Plus, Cherry Healey visits a water treatment centre to learn how Dublin gets clean drinking water.

programme.desc: With limited daylight, Alaskans must brave cruel temperatures to secure their survival. Storms make essentials like finding water supplies and pelts urgent.

However creating a magic potion is not as easy as it sounds, and the results can go spectacularly wrong.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Wishing to get rid of Gumball once and for all, his nemesis Rob offers up a variety of reality, action and comedy shows featuring characters other than Gumball. Unfortunately for Rob each one is worse than the last.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Wishing to get rid of Gumball once and for all, his nemesis Rob offers up a variety of reality, action and comedy shows featuring characters other than Gumball. Unfortunately for Rob each one is worse than the last.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is the champ of finding Mushables in their version of ‘hide-and-seek’ – ‘Hide your Hat’. The last one he needs to find is Mushpot. But Mushpot is the champ of hiding!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: With Sumush out of town, both Mush-Mush and Fung think that they are now the strongest Mushables in Mushton. But neither of them counts on the strength of Lilit and Miff!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is super happy to have Amanita become a collector as well. Until she starts getting better at collecting than he is!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers discover a super-sticky tree sap and use it to have lots of fun… until Mush-Mush gets stuck to Muddler’s back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When things go missing from everyone’s home-trees, our Mushlers get on the case to catch the culprit.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Morel notices a Mushlet who is too shy to join in with the others. He realizes why the Mushlet is so shy -- they are in awe of Mush-Mush. Morel gets Mush-Mush to boost the Mushlets confidence.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping. The bear confiscates the disco ball and propels the Lemmings far into the distance. They land in an ice cave where they discover a console that lights up the stars in the sky and controls the northern lights. The canopy of heaven starts blinking. The Lemmings transform the ice field into an open-air discotheque!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy fishes, a penguin comes over and sees that the bears bucket is empty. He decides to help him and catches piles of fish. Impressed, the bear brings the penguin back to the cabin, where a friendship rapidly strikes up. This pleasant and friendly new companion quickly arouses the Lemmings curiosity. They lure the penguin away on the sly and replace him with another one whos not nearly as clever. Grizzy will quickly see through the trickery.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy settles into the couch by the fireside, the Lemmings come charging into the living room on their new mount, the vacuum cleaner. Irritated, the bear throws the mechanical charger into the fireplace, which blows up. Freezing air sweeps into the cabin. Seeking a source of heat, Grizzy decides to move into the science station greenhouse where the temperature is controlled by a drone. But the bear is unaware of what he carries in his luggage: the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a new playmate: a walrus! The rodents ride the creature throughout the cabin, then make him slide down the roof before starting all over again.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy goes fishing, the Lemmings jump on the opportunity to transform the cabin into a giant ice slide. Upon his return, the bear puts an end to the rodents bobsleigh party and gets ready to savor his days catch. But the Lemmings steal his fish and draw the bear outside the cabin. Grizzy must try to recover his lunch while protecting his territory from a rodent invasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has to give the Mushlets a talk about spiders. But talking in front of a group makes Chep nervous. Mush-Mush offers to do it instead. Problem is Mush-Mush’s knowledge of spiders is so bad he ends up getting caught by one!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters. So they take her on a monster hunt and find more than they imagined.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to be brave enough to join in the daring games that Mush-Mush and Lilit like to play. So he gets some protective moss pants that make him not only indestructible but also fashionable… and a bit cocky. Woo, it’s the new Chep!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush really wants to get over his fear of snakes. Truff really wants to get over his fear of ants. So they team up to help each other overcome their fears ... maybe.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpot offers to look after the Mushies so Mushpie can get a well-earned rest. He thinks it will be easy. It is not easy! The Mushies end up pushing both Mushpot and Starmush to their limit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By pure chance, Grizzy discovers the pleasures of video games on the rangers console. The Lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his Kart racing game. They try everything, including temptation, to get him away from the console but theres nothing doing, Grizzy is addicted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a party for his beloved she-bear. But his doubles artificial intelligence leaves a lot to be desired.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzy¿s in love thinks she¿s a Lemming. Grizzy thinks that another little well-placed bang over the head will knock her ideas back into place. The only problem is that the Lemmings, who are delighted to have a new playmate, have no intention of letting him proceed with his plan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When a meteorite falls not far from the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make anyone who eats them grow to disproportionate sizes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery with an old treasure card that indicates the location of a treasure. Upon closer look, the representation of this treasure greatly resembles a giant jar of chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he brandishes a native american scepter that the Lemmings brought home with other antique objects, Grizzy sees the Lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. One of them has escaped the spell, but he will have to confront both Grizzy and his fellow creatures in order to recover the scepter and reverse the spell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear that hes in love with by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artists back is turned, the Lemmings gnaw at the work of art in order to transform it into a toboggan slide. Grizzy must succeed in getting rid of the Lemmings without his model realizing whats going on. An Art in itself!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. When "Happy Birthday" rings out, the surpriiiiiise! is as great for Grizzy, who is trying to take a nap after a hearty meal, as it is for the birthday Lemming hero in question. From that point on, Grizzy has only one objective: stop the din, which is not at all helping his migraine headache. But for the Lemmings, the party must go on at any price.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzys adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. But the Lemmings, who are riding on the back of a bucking caribou, realize that the flower makes their mount sneeze, which only makes the game ten times more fun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American chest. They are communicating vessels, so if he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other, regardless of the distance between them. This should satisfy Grizzys natural lazy streak, unless the Lemmings realise the incredible games they could play with the magic vases.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Night has fallen and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. He sees the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work, and tries to distract the Lemmings and capture the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings don’t miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Snowy and Jestah team up to execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze-berries, Batwing and Buff pair up to take on the dastardly duo, but Batwing decides to carry out the mission herself, putting both her and Buff at risk.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When all of the Batwheels (except for Bam) mysteriously disappear, Bam enlists the help of A.D.A.M, the original Batmobile, to help save his friends. Along the way, Bam comes to appreciate the old-school mobiles different crimefighting style as they team up to take on the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Much to everyone’s surprise, Bam is secretly afraid of the dark. When Poison Ivy knocks out all the power in Gotham, Bam must conquer his fears to stop her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Redbird tries his hand at espionage as “V-8, the Super-Spy”, he quickly realizes hes gotten in over his head.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build an outdoor movie theater in the park. / The Looney Builders discover Zippy, an acrobatic flea, living on Sylvester’s back.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Having just gone out to have a great picnic, the Tinkers are surprised by the rain and have to retreat inside; while the team is desperate to find something to do, Porky has a genius idea.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When a cold keeps David stuck inside, his friends get creative and play with him from outside his window. / When a blackout upends Vivies evening plans, Barney and the kids pivot to night time fun with help from the community.

programme.desc: When a blackout upends Vivies evening plans, Barney and the kids pivot to night time fun with help from the community. / When Mel and her dads road trip gets cancelled, Mel takes him on an imaginary trip instead so they can still spend time together.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about nature.

programme.desc: The cat and mouse detectives pose as bellhops at a swanky hotel to catch a jewel thief.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tuffys wish to be as strong as Spike comes true.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An old pair of Gingers tap shoes turns Tom into a tap dancing fanatic.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tuffy shows an interest in soccer, Jerry decides to be the little guys coach and show him how the game is really played by beating Tom in a one-on-one match.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of the preparations for the Duchesss surprise birthday party for her nephew, Rupert, and Jerry is determined to make a mess of it all.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Exasperated by the Lemmings who prevent him from watching his favorite TV show in peace, Grizzy catapults them out of the cabin. One of them passes through the northern lights and undergoes a strange mutation: he now has the power to control metal with his mind.

programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Woken with a start by a nightmare filled with Lemmings, Grizzy stumbles on the Rangers dream machine. Its a headphone set where you can program the theme of your choice before falling asleep within seconds for a night filled with sweet dreams. But who could possibly sleep soundly surrounded by Lemmings who want their fair share too?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto an old American India medallion bearing the symbol of the wind. He who wears it has the power to command air streams. Grizzy would be quite content to never leave the sofa again and control things from a distance, but the Lemmings want it to create fantastic new games that literally blow you away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. It soars off, leaving a rainbow-colored streak in its wake. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for his beloved she-bear, while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo on a bucking unicorn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for she-bear while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput, The Docs, The Thief and Droopy are all approaching the end of a typical day - the Docs are chasing Lamput, the thief has achieved the perfect gallery art heist and Droopy has finished his day at the office. But an unexpected collision causes confusion when their briefcases get muddled up and they each end up with each others belongings. Its’ not long before they find out about the mistake, but who has whose stuff? And how will they get it back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursuit of Lamput takes them to the North Pole, where Lamput is taking photographs of arctic wildlife. The Docs decide to disguise themselves as various animals to get close to Lamput, only to be thwarted each time by the same animals they’re pretending to be, including a polar bear mother and her cub.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: A freak accident causes Lamput to grow giant in size! The two Docs must find a way to deal with this gargantuan problem and catch him roaming the big city!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: During a visit to Londons National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whos afraid of silent movies about killer cats, alien blobs, and little men dancing in sugar bowls? Mr Bean. He is very scared. A trip to the cinema sends his imagination running wild.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up in time to compete.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Beaver Brothers hire The Looney Builders to build them a log cabin, but soon sidetrack the job by goofing around too much.

programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities: one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: its been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to ser

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After a particularly rough cat-and-mouse chase, Jerry quits! Tom is stunned as he watches his little friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave for another house. programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Spikes poker-playing pals go missing, he hires the cat and mouse detectives to find out where theyve gone.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

Unfortunately, there really isnt anything that frightening in, so they enlist Jerry to conjure up some scares – a task that hes only too happy to oblige, by taking full advantage of the situation.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom stars in a documentary that mischaracterizes his daily activities. All of his daily activities, from chasing Jerry to "romancing" Toodles are recorded.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby invents a transporting machine that accidentally transports Jerry and Tom to Paris where they meet Gigi and Cozette.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger are going on a vacation and bring Tom and Spike aboard the plane. Stowaways Jerry and Tuffy are also along for the ride, although Rick and Ginger arent aware - nor are they aware when all the pets start chasing each other on the plane!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger sneak Tom and Spike into a hotel where pets are not allowed, they make the pets promise not to leave the hotel room. Will the pets behave or will they trash the hotel and get kicked out of their paradise vacation?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landlady’s back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman – and the mission – are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast! But when the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbird’s beach day plans, Bam helps him realize that even though things didn’t go exactly as planned, they still had a great day!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage. As they adapt to their temporary home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of what you have.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batman refuses to engage Joker in a race, Prank goads Bam into a rematch. Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: A series of spooky sounds and sights leads the Batwheels to believe that the Batcave is haunted by a B-B-Bat-Ghost!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Grady fills a big crack in the parks entryway with concrete so no one trips. Vivie comes up with the idea to add found items, creating a beautiful art piece, and discovers that even though shes small she can have a big effect on the park.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: At lunch in the park, Mels friends are unwilling to try a taste of her kimchi. Barney whips up a beach day with Baby Bop, where she doesnt want to do anything new. The kids realize the value of trying new things to show others you care.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemmings radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. But when Grizzy changes positions and his snoring stops, the Lemmings must find other sources of vibrations. Only these are no longer compatible with Grizzys nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piñata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mâche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. / Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. / Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs, Lamput stumbles into a hole in the ground, which leads in an underground civilization with a large tribe in it! Lamput gets misunderstood as the Chosen One according to the tribe’s prophecy. The tribe hails Lamput as the prophet and this proves to be a huge challenge for the Docs to catch Lamput, now that Lamput is surrounded by worshippers and guards at all times!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are in the mountains, doing mountainy things. They look through their binoculars and see Lamput in the distance, doing his own mountainy things. GET HIM! After a dramatic chase across the mountain range, Lamput escapes into a cave and the Docs pursue, but its no ordinary cave. Its the home of a very grumpy dragon who loves his beauty sleep! The Docs are captured and Lamput has to come to the rescue to save the day. Luckily for him, his new forest buddies and his specular musical skills might just help in coming up with a solution.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname "Tough Buff." But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.desc: Tweety spots a giant lemon in a tree and is determined to make lemonade for everyone.

programme.desc: While on a cruise ship with Rick and Ginger, Jerry and Tuffy go explore the ships buffet and leave Spike and Tom in the room. They all meet Meathead, a vicious ship cat who will stop at nothing to terrorize the four of them.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger take Tom and Spike on a road trip to Gingers aunts house where Spike is terrorized by a dog traveling in a trailer. Meanwhile, Jerry and Tuffy cause problems when they get caught in Rick and Gingers suitcase.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick uploads a video of Tom getting his head stuck in Jerrys mouse hole, but the video goes viral, and Tom becomes a laughing stock.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. Its up to the duo to see whats really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock and a piranha they won in the ball toss.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Woken with a start by a nightmare filled with Lemmings, Grizzy stumbles on the Rangers dream machine. But who could possibly sleep soundly surrounded by Lemmings who want their fair share too?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto an old American India medallion bearing the symbol of the wind. He who wears it has the power to command air streams. Grizzy would be quite content to never leave the sofa again and control things from a distance, but the Lemmings want it to create fantastic new games that literally blow you away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. It soars off, leaving a rainbow-colored streak in its wake. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for his beloved she-bear, while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo on a bucking unicorn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for she-bear while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring which is equipped with a tracker.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a customized hang-glider using a supermarket shopping cart for the nacelle and a ventilator as an engine. Their aerobatics fascinate the she-bear that Grizzy is in love with, which gives him the idea of replacing the shopping cart with a double-seat and inviting his beloved for a sky promenade. But confiscating a wing in mid-flight is not within the reach of just any old bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings scribble all over the book Snow White on the living room sofa. Grizzy throws them off with scant ceremony and they crash to the floor with their book.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the last hole of the ACME Acres miniature golf course. Porky is determined to make it just right for the children who will play on it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Beaver Brothers hire The Looney Builders to build them a log cabin, but soon sidetrack the job by goofing around too much.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
