programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Redbird tries his hand at espionage as “V-8, the Super-Spy”, he quickly realizes hes gotten in over his head.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesn’t think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a “bad today” doesn’t mean it’ll be a “bad tomorrow".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputer’s motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to “drive a mile in each other’s wheels” in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwing’s motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that they’re better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signal’s one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels face off with the Legion of Zoom as they attempt to recover Batmans stolen cowl from the villainous vehicles.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep discovers he is great at giving snails massages. But the Food and Travel Snails now want massages all the time. Exhausting! Chep has to learn how to tell them NO!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush goes on an adventure with Morel and Sushi-Mushi. He worries he wont be cool enough to fit in with the older Mushables, so makes Chep come along for support.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves dancing. The only Mushable she hasn’t danced with is Amanita. But Amanita doesn’t dance. Can Lilit get her dancing?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Miff has a blast playing a game with our Mushlers -- one that Fung refused to play. Now Fung worries that he has lost his best friend, and so tries to win her back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To prove to everyone that he does not make cooking mistakes, Sushi-Mushi revisits his chef training. But what he really needs training in, is admitting mistakes!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is finding getting some "alone time" to herself tricky. So when she finds an old shell to hang out in the forest, she is rapt and doesnt want to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create an irresistible rhythm on a set of magic drums and kick off a battle of the bands with Grizzy, who just wants a good nights sleep.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Sushi-Mushi’s excitement and pride over Chanterelle doing a portrait of him to hang in his restaurant turns to worry. What if his friends don’t like it? But, of course, Chanterelle would never let that happen.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to show the Mushies that they should fly high and follow their dreams, Mushpie starts leaf-gliding for the first time.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff wants to impress Sushi-Mushi by showing him how he can use his fog to steam food. But Sushi-Mushi thinks Puff wants to be his cooking rival!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and Lilit discover that each of them has a favourite beetle. This is great! They’re beetle buddies! However this quickly turns into a competition on who has the ‘best’ beetle...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having learnt that Starmush overcame his fear of the Dark Forest by staying a night there when he was a Mushler, Mush-Mush and Lilit convince Chep that they should do the same. But will they end up fearless or fearful?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by and it can even stop time and movement in ones surroundings. This will give him a sure advantage over the Lemmings, provided of course they dont get their hands on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his TV snack by a strange flow of incongruous objects that have been transformed into hot-air balloons. When he sees the Lemmings onboard these curious zeppelins, Grizzy understands that he will quickly have to confiscate their helium tank and balloons if he wants to relax in front of the TV.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers with great delight that the ranger has purchased a brand new multifunction Stressless recliner. But even an armchair designed for well-being - the ultimate in relaxation - can used for other purposes by the Lemmings, who transform it into a fearsome multi-game chair.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play kite-surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy notices that the she-bear hes in love with watches the kite perform arabesques in the sky with admirat

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy snatches the last jar of chocolate spread out from under the noses of the Lemmings. In exchange, he offers them the toy stuck inside the lid: a mini-flute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play a new game, floating like flags in the breeze from the fan set on maximum. But Grizzy quickly rids the living room of this interference.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun tearing down their Kapla block buildings, which they rebuild just as fast. Grizzy finds that the she-bear hes in love with is impressed by the construction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on into two.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams that hes a valiant knight who has just delivered his beloved. As he is about to take her in his arms, he is woken by the din of the Lemmings, who have chosen this particular day to blast music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. But first, hell have to stop the Lemmings fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to “gold leaf” the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that it’s his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game “Floor is Lava.” They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play “for real”!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesn’t think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a “bad today” doesn’t mean it’ll be a “bad tomorrow".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputer’s motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to “drive a mile in each other’s wheels” in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwing’s motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that they’re better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Thanks to a mysterious bag of magic beans, Bugs meets Elmer, a gentle giant who would like to build a castle in the clouds; its the perfect mission for DIYers.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids’ dance recital. / It’s Taz’s birthday, so The Looney Builders build him a huge ice cream sundae.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Grady fills a big crack in the parks entryway with concrete so no one trips. Vivie comes up with the idea to add found items, creating a beautiful art piece, and discovers that even though shes small she can have a big effect on the park.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: At lunch in the park, Mels friends are unwilling to try a taste of her kimchi. Barney whips up a beach day with Baby Bop, where she doesnt want to do anything new. The kids realize the value of trying new things to show others you care.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tyke is accidentally carried off to the local dump Spike is forced to enlist the help of Jerry and Tom to get his boy back before he is turned into a formidable junkyard pup.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An over protected Spike goes to extreme lengths to keep his precious pup safe from harm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry work together to save a live turkey from becoming the centerpiece of a holiday feast.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spikes bones are missing, and Frankie the Rat is the culprit. Now all they have to do is catch in the dirty rat in the act.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The detectives across the hall are responsible for a series of high profile thefts and are framing innocent people for the crimes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring which is equipped with a tracker.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device, Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring, which is equipped with a tracker. Grizzy decides to stick the spy device under a jar of chocolate spread, just in case the Lemmings should decide to carry it off.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a customized hang-glider using a supermarket shopping cart for the nacelle and a ventilator as an engine. Their aerobatics fascinate the she-bear that Grizzy is in love with, which gives him the idea of replacing the shopping cart with a double-seat and inviting his beloved for a sky promenade. But confiscating a wing in mid-flight is not within the reach of just any old bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings scribble all over the book Snow White on the living room sofa. Grizzy throws them off with scant ceremony and they crash to the floor with their book.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings favorite chocolate spread brand is organizing a big competition where the prize is a giant jar of spread. To win, one must make ten baskets in a row in a hoop set up on a supermarket parking lot for the occasion. Ready to play?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. Now the locals are enraged, and the docs take the opportunity to stir up an angry mob to take down the creature and catch Lamput in the process! Not unless Lamput’s new friend has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs’ latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of ‘Duplicate’ Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates can’t be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When all of the Batwheels (except for Bam) mysteriously disappear, Bam enlists the help of A.D.A.M, the original Batmobile, to help save his friends. Along the way, Bam comes to appreciate the old-school mobiles different crimefighting style as they team up to take on the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Much to everyone’s surprise, Bam is secretly afraid of the dark. When Poison Ivy knocks out all the power in Gotham, Bam must conquer his fears to stop her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Redbird tries his hand at espionage as “V-8, the Super-Spy”, he quickly realizes hes gotten in over his head.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesn’t think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a “bad today” doesn’t mean it’ll be a “bad tomorrow".

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny thrill us with some spooky dance moves!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build Kathy Bat an upside-down radio station, Porky has concerns but doesn’t speak up.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Queen Beatrice hires The Looney Builders to build a workshop in her beehive where there is one rule the crew has trouble following.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and won’t come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine, but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: "play," "pause" and "fast forward" to living beings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom takes a shot to the kisser that knocks the cat out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie bring home a magic ogres tooth.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick accidentally locks Tom and Jerry in the garage.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While on a cruise ship with Rick and Ginger, Jerry and Tuffy go explore the ships buffet and leave Spike and Tom in the room. They all meet Meathead, a vicious ship cat who will stop at nothing to terrorize the four of them.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger take Tom and Spike on a road trip to Gingers aunts house where Spike is terrorized by a dog traveling in a trailer. Meanwhile, Jerry and Tuffy cause problems when they get caught in Rick and Gingers suitcase.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie bring home a fortune-telling magic mirror. When it shows Tom a future he doesnt like, he tries everything to avoid it. In fact, everything that Tom does to avoid his future only seems to make it worse.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike comes to Tom and Jerry for help finding his missing bones. The detectives investigate a community garden, and it seems like their number-one suspect is an elusive gopher. It turns out that Tyke dug up all of his dads bones and was saving them as a birthday present for Spike.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After struggling to solve a riddle from Riddlers helicopter Quizz, Redbird must learn to speak up and share his ideas with the Batwheels. / After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam from a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Legion of Zoom is tired of always losing. They decide to take a page from the Batwheels and try using teamwork in order to pull off a daring heist. But will they be able to work together?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird sacrifices his stealth muffler tech to sound as loud as the other Batwheels but his modifications backfire when Robin needs his stealthy skills to catch the elusive Catwoman!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batcomputer shuts down for a system update, the other Batwheels must take over for her while aiding Batman in a battle against Harley Quinn.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: “Chasing Lamput” turns out to be the ultimate backstage pass; the Docs pursue the orange blob through the dressing room and directly onto the stage of a gigantic stadium rock concert. The crowd goes wild. Which raises questions about their taste in music, to be honest; Skinny plays guitar like he’s gotten himself tangled in the strings (which he has), and Specs’ drumming, well, it’s certainly got passion. No taste, skill or rhythm, but certainly passion. The stage ends up in tatters by the time the actual band arrives. Those Docs are a hard act to follow.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When David wants to play video games all day, Barney puts a magical spin on some physical play that brings all the kids together in a game. David realizes the value of balancing both kinds of fun.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie fears shes jeopardized Nonnas love after she accidentally knocks over Nonnas flower pots. During an adventure in the Enchanted Garden, Barneys big mistakes ruin their fun and Vivie realizes the power of unconditional love.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. He immediately tries to activate the reverse procedure, but the Lemmings steal the figurine in order to turn into a partridge and fly away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. Grizzy is sure that a stick like that would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings, who have become sorcerers apprentices?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Whilst trying to stop the Lemmings from playing with a crate of firework rockets Grizzy is literally carried away with them when the largest specimen shoots off

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is hiding in a school, and the only way for the Docs to get him is to anti-age zap themselves back into childhood. (obviously)After stalking him in the corridors and unsuccessfully evading detention slips from the Headteacher, they find themselves in class. Skinny is rather happy to be back, but Specs doesnt like tests or art or chemistry or anything that distracts him from his true objective. Each time they almost get him, Lamput is saved by the bell (and even becomes the bell), and its a race against home time to see if they can get Lamput before the Headteacher gets them.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After repeated failures, the Docs finally realized what they were lacking: a good moustache! With their powerful facial hair, they are now unstoppable!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Boss and the Docs chase Lamput all the way into outer space! On the moon, Lamput discovers that aliens may be plotting to destroy Earth! He seeks the Docs for help.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Bean’s mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up in time to compete.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny rock us with some groovy moves!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie bring home a fortune-telling magic mirror. When it shows Tom a future he doesnt like, he tries everything to avoid it. In fact, everything that Tom does to avoid his future only seems to make it worse.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike comes to Tom and Jerry for help finding his missing bones. The detectives investigate a community garden, and it seems like their number-one suspect is an elusive gopher. It turns out that Tyke dug up all of his dads bones and was saving them as a birthday present for Spike.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Wanting to cool off from the heat, Tom and Jerry use magic to make it snow, turning the witches world into a haunted wonderland with an evil snowman.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing, Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel. Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebodys got to go.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its that special time of year when the Lady of the Houses rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. Its up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings favorite chocolate spread brand is organizing a big competition where the prize is a giant jar of spread. To win, one must make ten baskets in a row in a hoop set up on a supermarket parking lot for the occasion. Ready to play?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the "infiltrating" Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build Kathy Bat an upside-down radio station, Porky has concerns but doesn’t speak up.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Queen Beatrice hires The Looney Builders to build a workshop in her beehive where there is one rule the crew has trouble following.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs, Lola, Daffy, Porky and Tweety utilise their vehicles to tackle construction projects, all the while acquiring valuable insights.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Penelope Pussycat to build a fashion runway in France where they are encouraged to make their design bigger and more fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China, but the crew faces a major setback and Bugs worries about letting down his favourite chef.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage. / Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show, but when Batman needs their help, they must choose between winning the competition and their responsibilities to fight crime.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a mishap involving a bucket of grey paint, Lamput ends up back at the Lab, working undercover as the newest Doc on the block.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie starts coaching Sumush to become fitter, faster, stronger, it unleashes a new Mushpie: one who demands excellence and full commitment! Poor Sumush!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To Truff, making music comes effortlessly. So when he needs to put in a big effort to make a ‘forest song’, it affects him in unusual ways.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves Chanterelles art so much. But when Chanterelle makes a statue of Lilit, she cant stand it. Does Lilit tell the truth or does she just carry on pretending to like it?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers learn that Mushpie absolutely cannot resist an adorable look. And now everyone is using their adorable power to get Mushpie to do what they want!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle absolutely loves everything about bark-boarding ... until she tries it!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone thinks that Puff has done what no Mushable has ever done before -- touched Muddlers mud pile. But has he really?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her… Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesn’t trust.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers’ home-tree isn’t big enough to store all of Chep’s collections. So Chep goes all around Mushton to find a new home for them – and no way he’s letting them move out without him!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is the champ of finding Mushables in their version of ‘hide-and-seek’ – ‘Hide your Hat’. The last one he needs to find is Mushpot. But Mushpot is the champ of hiding!

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Äiti tekee neulontakoetta internetissa ja kaikkien pitaa olla mahdollisimman hiljaa, joten Finias ja Ferb kehittavat ninja-asuja, jotka katkevat kayttajansa kaikilta paitsi toisilta ninjoilta. Silla valin Buford ryhtyy tohtori Tollontyon katyriksi, mutta kaipaa sisimmassaan ”omaa norttiaan”.

programme.title: Spidey ja hanen mahtavat ystavansa
programme.desc: Kaikkien rakastama seittisankari Spidey saa rinnalleen Ghost-Spiderin (Gwen Stacey) ja Miles Moralesin. Yhdessa he ovat Spidey-tiimi, joka saa apua Spideyn hassulta, mutta uskolliselta Spidey-botilta TRACE-E:lta. Jos Spidey kohtaa tiukan paikan ja kaipaa viela enemman supersankarivoimaa, joku Avenger-ystava rientaa kylla apuun. Oli kyse sitten pelkasta Spidey-tiimista tai heita avustavista Avengereista, nama supersankarit pelastavat paivan yhdessa tuumin!Ajoittaiset vilkkuvat valot tai kuviot voivat vaikuttaa valoherkkiin katsojiin.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.
